title: Barrymore (2011)

writer.name: William Luce
writer.description: originally written for the stage by

overview: Christopher Plummer treads the boards as a past-his-prime John Barrymore.
storyline: As John Barrymore reckons with the ravages of his life of excess, he rents an old theatre to rehearse for a backer's audition to raise money for a revival of his 1920 Broadway triumph in Richard III.
